titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to Sarah C. Hutcheson
CWG13747

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 6

body.p:
NO. 22.
The United States, ^State of Kentucky^
To Mrs -- Hutchinson Dr.

row.cell: To Boarding Two recruits 18 Days @ 30ct per day

body.p:
Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W Finnell
Adt Genl Ky Vols
I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the Public Service.
Wm K Gray 2nd Lieut Recruiting officer
Received at Frankfort Ky the 1: of May 1863, of Jno W Finnell Adj. Genl Ky Vols Quartermaster U.S. Army, the sum of Twenty one Dollars and ninety cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. 128 ^176^ Abstract B P Qr. 186
Mrs Hutchison
Dollars $2190/100
Paid 1" May 1863

NO. 22.
The United States, ^State of Kentucky^
To Mrs -- Hutchinson Dr.

row.cell: To Boarding Two recruits 18 Days @ 30ct per day

body.p:
Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W Finnell
Adt Genl Ky Vols
I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the Public Service.
Wm K Gray 2nd Lieut Recruiting officer
Received at Frankfort Ky the 1: of May 1863, of Jno W Finnell Adj. Genl Ky Vols Quartermaster U.S. Army, the sum of Twenty one Dollars and ninety cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. 128 ^176^ Abstract B P Qr. 186
Mrs Hutchison
Dollars $21.90/100
Paid 1" May 1863
